Frequently Asked Questions

Is Steve AI free?

Yes, Steve AI is free to try. It’s a great way to explore our AI video generator before upgrading for more downloads and premium features.

Why is Steve AI better than any other AI video generator?

Many tools offer video creation, but users consistently rate Steve AI as the best AI video generator for its ease of use, value for money, and quality of output. We’re also proud to be a 5-star rated platform on Product Hunt.

Is my data secure with Steve AI?

Yes, Steve AI is safe and trusted by global teams. The platform is GDPR compliant, certified with ISO 27001 for robust information security, and part of CyberGRX, ensuring third-party risk management at enterprise standards. Your projects and data are always handled with privacy and protection in mind.

Can I download videos on Steve AI for free?

Yes! With the free plan, you get 20 minutes of AI videos per month, 200 AI asset credits, unlimited video generation, and even 2 free local download. You can also publish directly to YouTube, making it easy to start creating videos.

Can Steve AI generate videos?

Absolutely! Just type in your idea or prompt, and Steve AI instantly generates ready to publish videos with visuals, narration, and music.

What is Steve AI used for?

Steve AI is an AI video generation tool that converts any text or script into engaging videos within minutes. Our AI video creator is designed to make video creation fast, simple, and accessible to everyone.

What kind of videos can I create with Steve AI?

With Steve AI, you can create explainers, storytelling videos, kids’ content, promo ads, generative videos, animation videos, and even geopolitical news videos.

Does Steve AI have an app?

Yes, there’s an iOS app that enables you to create and edit videos anywhere. Perfect for creators on the go looking to create quick social media content.

How to download from Steve AI?

Once your video is ready, just click “Download.” On the free plan, you get unlimited video generation and 2 local download, plus the option to publish directly to YouTube. Paid plans unlock HD quality and watermark-free downloads.

Why is Steve AI the number 1 AI tool for creating videos?

Users rate Steve AI as the best AI video generator because it’s easy to use, delivers high-quality output, and offers great value for money. It’s the only tool with 3 patents, a one-stop shop for all video needs, and trusted by both B2C creators and B2B teams with full AI compliance and security. Backed by Animaker (a G2 Top 5 design product in the world) and 5-star rated on Product Hunt, Steve AI leads the way in AI-powered video creation.

Steve AI isn’t just another video tool. It’s built for faceless creators who want to share ideas, grow an audience, and earn without being on camera. From turning text into videos to adding voices, motion effects, or UGC-style ads, everything you need to create and scale lives in one place.
